All Classes

Class Description
AuthenticationBean
Authentication Bean Returns the details of that user who attempting to login.
Comment
Class representing a comment made by a User on a given Proposal.Specifies all the fields and relationships of Comment entity in the database.
CommentController
Comments Controller This is a controller class for comments to be seen on proposals.
CommentDAO
This class is a Data Access Object Class for Comment shown on proposals.It has the following methods fetchAllComments method to fetch all the comments of a given proposal createComment method to save the comment deleteComment to delete a comment
CommentService
Class representing Comment Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for Creation,Deletion and Retrieval of Comment objects from the database ,received from the CommentController
CustomUserDetails
Custom User Details This class implements userDetails interface of spring boot security.
DateUtil  
Email
This is a helper class which contains the object of the email.
EmailService
Email Service This is a service class this class is used to send the mail to the user containing the reset link
FeedController
Feed Controller This is a controller class to show the different Feed streams on the Landing page.
FeedService
Class representing Feed Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for retrieval of view based list of Proposal objects from the database ,received from the FeedController
ForgotPasswordController
ForgotPassword Controller Provides Rest-APIs for forgot password and reset password.
HomeController
Home Controller Provides Rest-APIs for user registration and login.
HomeService
Home Service This is service class this class is used to fetched the data of team from team database
ImprovementProposalSystemApplication  
JsonUtil  
Message
This is a helper class which contains the message which is used during the exception handling.
ModelWrap
Model Wrap Class This class wraps the object of user model and team models
MyConfig
MyConFig Class This is a configuration class of spring boot security.
Password
This is a helper class which contains the object of the password.
Proposal
Class representing a Process Improvement Proposal made by a given User.Specifies all the fields and relationships of Proposal entity in the database.
ProposalController
Proposal Controller This is a controller class for proposals which will be seen on different feeds.
ProposalDAO
This class is a Data Access Object Class for Proposal made.It has the following methods fetchAllProposals getDefault fetchUserProposals deleteProposal saveProposal
ProposalService
Class representing Proposal Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for Creation,Deletion and Retrieval of Proposal objects from the database ,received from the ProposalController and FeedController
Team
This is a model class for team this class implements the information of team which is required to create a new team.
TeamController
Team Controller This is a controller class for all the teams that are in the system.It has the getAllTeams method.
TeamDAO
This class is a Data Access Object Class for Team in the system.
TeamService
Team Service This is a service class this class is used to fetch all the team names
TimerService
Timer Service This is a service class this class is used to set the timer
Token
This is a model class for token this class generates the token which is used during the forget password API.
TokenDAO
This class is a Data Access Object Class for Token made on tokens.It has the following methods getToken deleteToken existsById saveToken getById
TokenId
This is a helper class which contains the object of the tokenId.
TokenService
Token Service This is a service class this class is used to create token and delete token.
Upvotes
Class representing an upvote made by a User on a given Proposal.Specifies all the fields and relationships of Upvote entity in the database.
UpvotesController
Upvotes Controller This is a controller class for upvotes done on proposals.
UpvotesDAO
This class is a Data Access Object Class for Upvotes made on proposals.It has the following methods createUpvote fetchAllUpvotes deleteUpvote getUpvoteforUserIdAndProposalId
UpvotesService
Class representing Upvotes Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for Creation,Deletion and Retrieval of Upvotes objects from the database ,received from the UpvotesController
User
This is a model class for user this class implements all the basic details of user which are required for registration purpose and this class also has one to many relationship with team model.
UserAuth
This is a helper class which contains the information of that user who logged in via social media first time.
UserController
User Controller Provides Rest-APIs for logging in through social media .
UserDAO
This class is a Data Access Object Class for User in the system.It has the getById method
UserDetailsServiceImpl
User Details Service Impl This class implements UserDetailsService interface of spring boot security.
UserRepository
This is a repository interface this interface extends the JPA repository which is used for fetching the user data from the database.
UserService
User Controller Service This is service class this class is used for calling userRepository class to fetch the data from database
